name: YesorNo-TheClassic
0:
”Alexa, open yes or no the classic”
”Alexa, start yes or no the classic”
”Alexa, play yes or no the classic”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yes or no the classic
des:
Welcome to a fresh look of the classic 'Yes or No' game. 

Say 'Yes' or 'No' to a set of interesting questions and get instant insights with a personal touch. The interactive experience indulges you with personalised responses and quick statistics for each question.

Embrace the like-minded community around you, completely anonymously! Without sharing any information about you, feel connected to our ever growing circle of friends.

Yes. No. Pass. Repeat. The game is very intuitive and easy to get started. In case if you are confused on how to get around it, please say 'Help' to invoke our detailed instructions and list of commands.

Rediscover yourself with our thought-provoking questions on life and everything else around it! And if you feel there's something that you want our community to answer, feel free to suggest your questions to us. After a quality-check and review, our curators readily add your suggestions to the 'Yes or No - The Classic' questionnaire! Visit our website www.venolus.com for more information.

We hope the new avatar of this game is fun and engaging. Reach out to us at feedback@venolus.com with your valuable comments and feedback.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
